game.beginning: You wake up in a mysterious room with no memory of who you are or how you got there. There is a note on the floor that says, 'Find the key to escape!'
game.ending: After a series of mind-bending puzzles, you finally find the key and unlock the door. As you step outside, you are greeted by blinding sunlight and a sense of freedom.
game.synopsis: Embark on a thrilling adventure as you navigate through a maze of riddles and puzzles to find your way out of a locked room. Uncover your true identity and escape the confines of this mysterious place.
game.title: The Forgotten Maze
